channel.title: [PI]Adding/Removing objects
channel.description: When you log in, let's just say there is an object that you either removed or added. You can see this object either spawn or despawn. How can I enable it to where they are already despawned/spawned when a player logs in right beside the object?

item.title: [PI]Adding/Removing objects
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

[quote=“Damoiscool, post:2, topic:452646”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=555521.msg4067081#msg4067081 date=1343975627]
When you log in, let’s just say there is an object that you either removed or added. You can see this object either spawn or despawn. How can I enable it to where they are already despawned/spawned when a player logs in right beside the object?
[/quote]

What you said doesn’t make much sense but adding/removing objects in PI is located in objectmanager.java[/quote]

I know what he means.

@OP you could edit the map with a map editor or if possible change the order of loading.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Adding/Removing objects
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Tutorial:

When you log in, let’s just say there is an object that you either removed or added. You can see this object either spawn or despawn. How can I enable it to where they are already despawned/spawned when a player logs in right beside the object?

What you said doesn’t make much sense but adding/removing objects in PI is located in objectmanager.java

Read full topic
